details.description: Method of horizontal advection

choices.label: Incremental Re-mapping
choices.description: (including Semi-Lagrangian)

details.label: Transport In Thickness Method
details.description: Method of ice migration in thickness space

choices.label: Incremental Re-mapping
choices.description: (including Semi-Lagrangian)

details.label: Ice Strength Formulation Method
details.description: Describe how ice-strength is formulated

details.label: Ice Redistribution Processes
details.description: Additional processes which can redistribute sea ice.

details.label: Ice Deformation Method
details.description: Ice deformation method

choices.label: elastic-visco-plastic
choices.description: EVP

choices.label: visco-plastic
choices.description: VP

details.label: Basal Heat Flux
details.description: Method by which basal heat flux is handled

details.label: New Ice Formation Method
details.description: Method by which new sea ice is formed

details.label: Ice Lateral Melting Method
details.description: Method of sea ice lateral melting

details.label: Ice Surface Sublimation Method
details.description: Method sea ice surface sublimation

details.label: Frazil Ice Method
details.description: Method of including frazil ice

details.label: Inclusion Method
details.description: Method by which basal heat flux is handled

choices.label: Heat Reservoir
choices.description: Brine inclusions treated as a heat reservoir

choices.label: None
choices.description: No brine inclusions included in sea ice thermodynamics

choices.label: Thermal Fixed Salinity
choices.description: Thermal properties depend on S-T (with fixed salinity)

choices.label: Thermal Varying Salinity
choices.description: Thermal properties depend on S-T (with varying salinity

details.label: Fixed Salinity Value
details.description:
If you have selected "Thermal properties depend on S-T (with fixed salinity)
               please supply the fixed salinity value for each sea ice layer.

detailSets.label: Vertical Heat Diffusion
detailSets.description: Characteristics of vertical heat diffusion in sea ice.

details.label: Is Single Layer
details.description: Is there a single layer for vertical heat diffusion?

details.label: Is Multi Layer
details.description: Are there multiple layers for vertical heat diffusion?

details.label: Number Of Layers
details.description: If there are multiple layers for vertical heat diffusion specify how many ?

details.label: Regular Grid
details.description: If multiple layers, are they regularly distributed ?

details.label: Is Based On Semtner
details.description: Is method based on Semtner 1976 ?

details.label: Are Included
details.description: Are melt ponds included in sea ice model?

details.label: Formulation Method
details.description: Method by which melt ponds are included

details.label: Processes
details.description: Processes included in melt pond scheme ?

subProcesses.label: Snow Processes
subProcesses.description: Thermodynamic processes in snow on sea ice

details.label: Process Type
details.description: Snow processes in sea ice thermodynamics

choices.label: snow redistribution scheme
choices.description: Is there a scheme to redistribute snow on sea ice by wind or melting processes?

details.label: Heat Content Precip
details.description: Method by which the heat content of precipitation is handled ?

detailSets.label: General
detailSets.description: General properties of sea ice thermodynamics

details.label: Therm Budget
details.description: What information required to close the thermodynamics budget?

details.label: Additional Processes
details.description: List any additional processes not elsewhere described

subProcesses.label: Methods
subProcesses.description: Properties of radiation in sea ice

details.label: Surface Albedo
details.description: Method used to handle surface albedo

choices.label: Specified values of albedo for e.g. cold or melting snow, melting sea ice

enum.description: Surface albedo of sea ice component
enum.label: seaice_albedo

details.label: Ice Radiation Transmission
details.description: Method by which solar radiation through sea ice is handled

details.label: Layering Type
details.description: What method is used to represent sea ice layering ?

choices.label: 2-levels
choices.description: Simulation uses two layers.

choices.label: Multi-level
choices.description: Simulation uses more than two layers

choices.label: ice types
choices.description: Simulation does not use layers, but has multiple ice types per grid cell

choices.label: zero-layer
choices.description: Simulation has no internal ice thermodynamics.

detailSets.label: Horizontal
detailSets.description: How the sea ice is horizontally discretised?

details.label: Horizontal Discretisation
details.description: Type of sea ice horizontal discretisation ?

choices.label: Atmosphere Grid
choices.description: Sea ice is horizontally discretised on the atmospheric grid

choices.label: Ocean grid
choices.description: Sea ice is horizontally discretised on the ocean grid

choices.label: Own Grid
choices.description: Sea ice is horizontally discretised on it`s own independent grid

enum.description: Grid which is the sea ice horizontally discretised on?
enum.label: sea_ice_grid

details.label: Additional Details
details.description: Specify any additional grid discretisation details.

detailSets.label: Seaice Categories
detailSets.description: What method is used to represent sea ice categories ?

details.label: Number Of Categories
details.description: If using multiple sea ice categories specify how many.

details.label: Category Limits
details.description: If using multiple sea ice categories specify the category limits.

details.label: Thickness Distribution Scheme
details.description: If applicable describe the sea ice thickness distribution scheme

detailSets.label: Snow On Seaice
detailSets.description: Method used to represent snow on sea ice

details.label: Has Snow On Ice
details.description: Is snow on ice represented in this model ?

details.label: Number Of Snow Levels
details.description: Number of vertical levels of snow on ice ?

detailSets.label: General
detailSets.description: General key properties in sea ice

details.label: Basic Approximations
details.description: Basic approximations made in the ice.

choices.label: EVP
choices.description: Elastic Viscous Plastic dynamics

choices.label: VP
choices.description: Viscous Plastic dynamics

enum.description: List key basic approximation in sea ice model
enum.label: seaice_basic_approx_types

details.label: Prognostic Variables
details.description: List of prognostic variables in the sea ice component.

choices.label: Snow depth
choices.description: Snow on ice thickness

choices.label: Snow temperature
choices.description: Snow on ice temperature

enum.description: List of prognostic variables in sea ice
enum.label: prognostic_vars_types

details.label: Timestep
details.description: What is the time step in the sea ice model in seconds.

detailSets.label: Seawater Properties
detailSets.description: Physical properties of seawater relevant to sea ice

details.label: Ocean Freezing Point
details.description: Equation used to compute the freezing point (in deg C) of seawater, as a function of salinity and pressure

choices.label: Constant
choices.description: Constant value of seawater freezing point is used.

enum.description: Types of seawater freezing point equation in sea ice.
enum.label: seawater_freezing_point

details.label: Ocean Freezing Point Value
details.description: If using a constant seawater freezing point, specify this value.

details.label: Ocean Specific Heat
details.description: Value of specific heat content in ocean (cpocean) in J/(kg K)

details.label: Ocean Reference Density
details.description: Value of the Boussinesq reference density (rhozero) in kg / m3)

detailSets.label: Resolution
detailSets.description: Resolution in the sea ice grid

details.label: Name
details.description:
This is a string usually used by the modelling group to describe the resolution of this grid
               e.g. N512L180, T512L70, ORCA025 etc.

details.label: Canonical Horizontal Resolution
details.description: Expression quoted for gross comparisons of resolution, eg. 50km or 0.1 degrees etc.

details.label: Number Of Horizontal Gridpoints
details.description: Total number of horizontal (XY) points (or degrees of freedom) on computational grid.

details.label: Is Adaptive Grid
details.description: Default is False. Set true if grid resolution changes during execution.

detailSets.label: Tuning Applied
detailSets.description: Tuning applied to sea ice model component

details.label: Description
details.description:
General overview description of tuning: explain and motivate the main targets and metrics retained.
               Document the relative weight given to climate performance metrics versus process oriented metrics,
               and on the possible conflicts with parameterization level tuning. In particular describe any struggle
               with a parameter value that required pushing it to its limits to solve a particular model deficiency.

details.label: Target
details.description: What was the aim of tuning, e.g. correct sea ice minima, correct seasonal cycle.

details.label: Simulations
details.description: Which_simulations had tuning applied, e.g. all, not historical, only pi-control?

details.label: Metrics Used
details.description: List any observed metrics used in tuning model/parameters

detailSets.label: Assumptions
detailSets.description: Assumptions made in the sea ice model

details.label: Description
details.description:
General overview description of any key assumptions made in this model,
               particularly where this may affect the diagnostic sea ice variables.

details.label: Missing Processes
details.description: Are there any key processes missing in this model configuration that affect the diagnostic sea ice variables ?

detailSets.label: Conservation
detailSets.description: Conservation in the sea ice component

details.label: Description
details.description: Description of conservation methodology

details.label: Scheme
details.description: Properties conserved in sea ice by the numerical schemes

enum.description: List of properties that can be conserved in sea ice
enum.label: conservation_props_types

details.label: Consistency Properties
details.description: Any additional consistency properties (e.g. energy conversion) ?

details.label: Corrected Conserved Prognostic Variables
details.description: Set of variables which are conserved by *more* than the numerical scheme alone.

details.label: Conserved Properties
details.description: For each conserved property conserved please specify the terms which close the related budget

details.label: Was Flux Correction Used
details.description: Does conservation involved flux correction ?
